description:
In a world plunged into ice and snow, where a catastrophe has turned the Earth into a new ice age, an eclectic group of prehistoric creatures embark on an epic journey in search of survival and warmth. Led by Glacier, a majestic woolly rhinoceros, the group faces countless challenges and dangers on their way to the legendary Warm Valley.

Accompanied by Rockslide, a sturdy armadillo, Blizzard, an agile cave lion, Flicker, a curious jerboa, and Glimmer, a prehistoric dragonfly with iridescent wings, these brave travelers must join forces and overcome their fears to reach their destination.


Why would you like it?

·Loving and friendly characters: Glacier, the woolly rhinoceros; Rockslide, the sturdy armadillo; Blizzard, the agile cave lion; Flicker, the curious jerboa; and Glimmer, the prehistoric dragonfly with iridescent wings.

·Full-color backgrounds: Immerse yourself in a vibrant and detailed world of ice and snow, filled with stunning landscapes.

·Immersive story of more than an hour: An epic journey to the legendary Warm Valley, full of adventure and excitement.

·Captivating music: A soundtrack that accompanies every moment, making the experience even more magical.

·Inspiring values: Lessons about friendship, teamwork and overcoming fears to achieve a common goal
name: Ice World: The Frozen Age
